name: ClarityUI.Grid
comment:
Clarity UI Uses the Bootstrap Flex-grid. This module is borrowed from `elm-bootstrap`

 Bootstrap includes a powerful mobile-first flexbox grid system for building layouts of all shapes and sizes. Itâ€™s based on a 12 column layout and has multiple tiers, one for each media query range.
    Grid.container
        [ Grid.row
            [ Row.topXs ]
            [ Grid.col
                [ Col.xs4 ]
                [ text "col1-row1"]
            , Grid.col
                [ Col.xs8 ]
                [ text "col2-row1"]
            ]
        , Grid.simpleRow
            [ Grid.col
                [ Col.xs4 ]
                [ text "col1-row2"]
            , Grid.col
                [ Col.xs6 ]
                [ text "col2-row2"]
            ]
        ]
# Containers
@docs container, containerFluid
# Rows
@docs row, simpleRow, keyedRow
# Columns
@docs col, colBreak, keyedCol, Column

types.name: Column
types.comment: Opaque type representing a column element

values.name: col
values.comment:
Create a column
* `options` List of column options
* `children` List of child elments
values.type: List (ClarityUI.Grid.Col.Option msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> ClarityUI.Grid.Column msg

values.name: colBreak
values.comment: Creates a full width column with no content. Handy for creating equal width multi-row columns.

values.name: container
values.comment: Responsive fixed width container, which changes its max-width at breakpoint
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: containerFluid
values.comment: Full width container spanning the entire viewport
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: keyedCol
values.comment:
Create a column with keyed children
* `options` List of column options
* `keyedChildren` List of key,element child element tuples
values.type: List (ClarityUI.Grid.Col.Option msg) -> List ( String, Html.Html msg ) -> ClarityUI.Grid.Column msg

values.name: keyedRow
values.comment:
Create a row with keyed columns. Handy when you need to move columns around without getting massive rerenders.
* `options` List of row options
* `keydCols` List of key, column tuples
values.type: List (ClarityUI.Grid.Row.Option msg) -> List ( String, ClarityUI.Grid.Column msg ) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: row
values.comment:
Create a row
* `options` List of row options
* `cols` List of columns
values.type: List (ClarityUI.Grid.Row.Option msg) -> List (ClarityUI.Grid.Column msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: simpleRow
values.comment: Create a row with no configuration options

name: ClarityUI.CDN

values.name: icons
values.comment: Adds a link to an [unpkg](https://unpkg.com/#/) mirror of the clarify-icons css

values.name: iconsJS
values.comment: Adds a script to an unpkg](<https://unpkg.com/#/>) mirror of the clarify-icons js

values.name: styles
values.comment:
Adds a link to an [unpkg](https://unpkg.com/#/) mirror of the clarify-ui css

    import ClarityUI.CDN

    view : Model -> Html Msg
    view model =
        div []
            [ CDN.styles -- css embedded inline
            ]

name: ClarityUI.Alert

aliases.name: AlertItem
aliases.comment: Item to pass to an alert

types.name: AlertType
types.comment: Alert Type. Either Danger, Warning, Info or Success

values.name: alert
values.comment:
Main Alert Entry Point. Creates a clarity alert.

Documentation about Clarity Alerts: <https://vmware.github.io/clarity/documentation/alerts#top>
values.type: ClarityUI.Alert.AlertType -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> ClarityUI.Alert.AlertItem -> Html.Html msg

values.name: alertAppDanger
values.comment:
Alert App Danger.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible danger app alert.

Alert App Info.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Info app alert.

values.name: alertAppSuccess

Alert App Success.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Success app alert.

values.name: alertAppWarning

Alert App Warning.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible warning app alert.

values.name: alertDanger
values.comment:
Alert Danger.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible danger alert.

values.name: alertInfo
values.comment:
Alert Info.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Info alert.

values.name: alertSuccess
values.comment:
Alert Success.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Success alert.

values.name: alertWarning
values.comment:
Alert Warning.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible warning alert.
